Discover our business and explore a career

Bang & Olufsen has been designing the future since 1925. We have never been afraid to the edge of possibility. In an ever-changing world, our innovative design and technology continues to change the way we all hear, see and feel the world.

We are better together

Working with us, you will join an organisation that is on a mission to become a workplace where curious minds and compassionate people can learn and grow together.

Love that lasts a lifetime

Designing for longevity has always been at the heart of Bang & Olufsen, and our heritage of long-lasting, high-quality products and of craftsmanship and design shows our love for the planet, our people, and the communities we work in.

Make magic happen

We believe that magic happens in an environment of empowerment and authenticity. Our teams are dedicated to fostering passion and engagement in respect of each individual.

Ignite your entrepreneurship

Whether you are passionate about creating magical software, designing long-lasting products, producing world-class aluminium or diving into financial, organisational and marketing topics, we would love to hear from you!

Our Purpose, Mission, and Approach

To change how we hear, see and feel the world.

We want to reclaim every moment and add more meaning. So everyone can hear, see and feel with absolute fidelity. Be surrounded by belongings that soothe their senses. And be immersed in music and film that adds richness to life.

Be Entrepreneurial. Show Love. Create Magic.

Our values are deeply rooted in our DNA of a never-failing will to create only the best, to continuously find new ways and improvements. We celebrate the entrepreneurial imagination of our founders that so profoundly reflects our culture.

Magical sound. Designed for life.

We strive to connect our past with an exciting future in an effort to humanise technology, design for life and move the industry towards a better world.
